Understand the professional, ethical and social responsibilities.

Exhibit entrepreneurship skills through careful planning and execution of research projects and publications.

why_choose: Why choose this course? Interdisciplinary focus, real-world application Cutting-edge research chances. Expert faculty and dedicated mentors. Research-based learning. Tailored specialisations. Industry partnerships and real-world experience.
what_learn: What you will learn? Advanced theoretical and experimental physics. Computational skills for scientific analysis. Research methodology for in-depth study. Laboratory understanding and practical skills. Specialized tracks in Materials Science, Energy Science, and Astrophysics. Critical thinking and problem-solving through tutorials and seminars.
modules: Modules Classical Mechanics Quantum Mechanics Year 1 Electrodynamics Statistical Physics Astrophysics Material Science Year 2 Energy Science Research based Dissertation
career: Career prospects Research scientists in various fields. College/University Professor. Data Analyst. Entrepreneurs. Energy Analyst. Astrophysicist.
